title: Just had a really awesome game experience, thanks Lyte!
body:
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2010319819/49660716?tab=overview

You see, we got destroyed in 20 minutes because our bot lane was dying as fast as they possibly could, but the reason the game was so enjoyable was because i was not called mean names the entire time! You see, that would have ruined my gaming experience. But thankfully due to Lyte's policies people did not call me mean names or type mean words to me at all. Very fun, enjoyable and high quality game, thanks Lyte!
